panels.description: Upstream/downstream ratio for the selected dashboard period

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(hr_1min{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}[$__range])) by (instance) / sum(avg_over_time(hr_1min{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}[$__range])) by (instance)

panels.title: Hashrate ratio

targets.expr: (sum by(job) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"node-exporter", mode!="idle"}[30s])) / on(job) group_left sum by (job)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"node-exporter"}[30s])))) * 100

sum(accepted {stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

sum(rejected {stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

sum(stale {stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="upstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

sum(accepted {stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

sum(rejected {stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

sum(stale {stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) / (sum(accepted{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(rejected{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}) + sum(stale{stream="downstream", algorithm="$algorithm", name=~"$route_name"}))

panels.description: Average mining difficulty set by target pool(s)
panels.title: Upstream difficulty

panels.description: Average mining difficulty set to miners
panels.title: Downstream difficulty
